file.title: Base Map
file.caption: Map of finite fault showing it's geographic context

file.title: CMT Solution
file.caption: Full CMT solution for every point in finite fault region

file.title: Inversion Parameters File 1
file.caption: Basic inversion parameters for each node in the finite fault

file.title: Inversion Parameters File 2
file.caption: Complete inversion parameters for the finite fault, following the SRCMOD FSP format (http://equake-rc.info/)

file.title: Coulomb Input File
file.caption: Format necessary for compatibility with Coulomb3 (http://earthquake.usgs.gov/research/software/coulomb/)

file.title: Moment Rate Function File
file.caption: Ascii file of time vs. moment rate, used for plotting source time function

file.title: Surface Deformation File
file.caption: Surface displacement resulting from finite fault, calculated using Okada-style deformation codes

file.title: FFM GeoJSON
file.caption: GeoJSON file of the finite fault model grid and earthquake location

file.title: Time Series JSON
file.caption: JSON file of time series data and synthetic models

file.title: Comment JSON
file.caption: JSON file of processing and result comments for this finite fault model
